title: TUTORIAL Miniature geranium with air dry clay | PDF + video
description: The price includes a tutorial on creating miniature geranium with air dry clay for dollhouses at a scale of 1:12. This tutorial is provided as a PDF file containing a description of the necessary materials, a link to the video tutorial, and step-by-step text instructions. For your convenience, the video is uploaded to YouTube and includes English subtitles. An active link to the video is available inside the PDF file and via a QR code.
